fullplot: Five men trapped in the basement vault of an office building share visions with each other of their demise. Stories revolve around vampires, bodily dismemberment, east Indian mysticism, an insurance scam, and an artist who kills by painting his victims' deaths.
plot: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.
title: The Vault of Horror
writers: Al Feldstein (based on the stories written by)
William M. Gaines (based on the stories written by)
